mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.AT_INSERTDATE DESC) AS RNUM, A.AT_NO, A.MB_NO, A.ST_NO, M.MB_NICKNAME, A.AT_INSERTDATE, A.ME_NO FROM ATTENDANCE A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MB_NO = M.MB_NO WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND TO_CHAR(AT_INSERTDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ME_NO = #{meetingNo} AND MB_NO = #{memberNo} AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) <= AT_INSERTDATE

SELECT CASE WHEN REQUIRED_ATT = 0 OR REQUIRED_ATT IS NULL OR ACTUAL_ATT = 0 OR ACTUAL_ATT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ACTUAL_ATT / REQUIRED_ATT END ATTENDANCE_RATE FROM (SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND MB_NO = #{memberNo}) AS ACTUAL_ATT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTENDANCE A USING (MB_NO) WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND MB_NO = #{memberNo} AND SYSDATE - #{recentDays} <= A.AT_INSERTDATE) AS REQUIRED_ATT FROM DUAL)

SELECT CASE WHEN REQUIRED_ATT = 0 OR REQUIRED_ATT IS NULL OR ACTUAL_ATT = 0 OR ACTUAL_ATT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ACTUAL_ATT / REQUIRED_ATT END ATTENDANCE_RATE FROM (SELECT (SELECT SUM(ME_REQUIRED_ATTENDANCE) FROM MEETING WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND SYSDATE - #{recentDays} <= ME_INSERTDATE) AS REQUIRED_ATT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND SYSDATE - #{recentDays} <= AT_INSERTDATE) AS ACTUAL_ATT FROM DUAL)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND #{now} BETWEEN ST_START AND ST_END
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} AND MB_NO = #{memberNo} AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) <= AT_INSERTDATE
